item.title: Tidy Tuesday 2020-02 - Australia Fires
item.description: The 2nd (1st?) #TidyTuesday of the year is on the Australia Bush Fires that are currently (as of 2020-01-07) raging. To display the temperature data, I built a shiny app. As an aside, I followed this post from Yang Liu to embed the app below. If the app fails, you can use it directly on shinyapps.io. Code for Shiny App library(tidyverse) library(shiny) library(shinydashboard) rainfall <- read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2020/2020-01-07/rainfall.csv') temperature <- read_csv('https://raw.
